CodeForces 686D 树的重心

Published: 27 Mar 2017 Category: dfs

链接

题意：给定一棵N个点树,q次询问,每次询问以某个结点为根的子树的重心。(N<=300000,q<=300000)

题解：

因为询问次数巨大, 所以我们要预处理所有结点的答案。

因为重心一定是在重链上的,所以我们只要对树先DFS一次找到重链，然后暴力的去找重心就可以了。

/*************************************************************************
    > File Name: 686D.cpp
    > Author: HandsomeHow
    > Mail: handsomehowyxh@gmail.com 
    > Created Time: 2017/3/27 16:27:50
 ************************************************************************/

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define rep(i,a,b) for(int i=(a);i<=(b);i++)
#define per(i,a,b) for(int i=(a);i>=(b);i--)
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define cl(a) memset((a),0,sizeof(a))
#ifdef HandsomeHow
#define dbg(x) cerr << #x << " = " << x << endl
#else
#define dbg(x)
#endif
typedef long long ll;
typedef unsigned long long ull;
typedef pair <int, int> pii;
const int inf=0x3f3f3f3f;
const double eps=1e-8;
const int mod=1000000007;
const double pi=acos(-1.0);
inline void gn(long long&x){
    int sg=1;char c;while(((c=getchar())<'0'||c>'9')&&c!='-');c=='-'?(sg=-1,x=0):(x=c-'0');
    while((c=getchar())>='0'&&c<='9')x=x*10+c-'0';x*=sg;}
inline void gn(int&x){long long t;gn(t);x=t;}
inline void gn(unsigned long long&x){long long t;gn(t);x=t;}
ll gcd(ll a,ll b){return a? gcd(b%a,a):b;}
ll powmod(ll a,ll x,ll mod){ll t=1ll;while(x){if(x&1)t=t*a%mod;a=a*a%mod;x>>=1;}return t;}
// (づ°ω°)づe★------------------------------------------------
const int maxn = 333333;
int ans[maxn], sz[maxn], son[maxn];
int n, q;
int par[maxn];

vector<int>E[maxn];

void dfs(int u, int p){
	ans[u] = u;
	if(E[u].size() == 0)
		son[u] = u;
	sz[u] = 1;
	for(auto it:E[u]){
		if(it == p)
			continue;
		dfs(it,u);
		sz[u] += sz[it];
		if(sz[it] > sz[son[u]])
			son[u] = it;
	}
	ans[u] = ans[son[u]];
	//printf("---%d %d %d\n",u,son[u],ans[u]);
	while(sz[u] - sz[ans[u]] > sz[u]/2 && ans[u] != u){
		ans[u] = par[ans[u]];
	}
}

int main(){
#ifdef HandsomeHow
	freopen("data.in","r",stdin);
	//freopen("data.out","w",stdout);
#endif
	gn(n);gn(q);
	rep(i,2,n){
		gn(par[i]);
		E[par[i]].pb(i);
	}
	dfs(1,-1);
	while(q--){
		int x;gn(x);
		printf("%d\n",ans[x]);
	}
	return 0;
}
